data.text:
Ehh, you're gonna carry that much by 
yourself? It's for the science room, right? 
Leave it to me, I'll help out!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Ehh, you're gonna carry that much by 
<story>yourself? It's for the science room, right? 
<story>Leave it to me, I'll help out!

data.text:
Thanks for always cleaning up this place! 
I'll go throw this trash away now!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for always cleaning up this place! 
<story>I'll go throw this trash away now!

data.text:
Fuuu! Good work out there! 
Today's run felt really good, and it was fun.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Fuuu! Good work out there! 
<story>Today's run felt really good, and it was fun.

data.text:
As usual, Kitasan Black was helping people as 
if it was natural. On top of that, it wasn't 
causing any issues with her training.
data.processed:
<story>As usual, Kitasan Black was helping people as 
<story>if it was natural. On top of that, it wasn't 
<story>causing any issues with her training.

data.text:
Oh, that's right! There was something I 
wanted to ask Trainer-san… about the 
timing of when to drive in, um-
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Oh, that's right! There was something I 
<story>wanted to ask Trainer-san… about the 
<story>timing of when to drive in, um-

data.text:
I see! So the way you pivot is important. Stay aware of the 
balance between your pivot foot and lower body, your center of 
gravity… I see, I see.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>I see! So the way you pivot is important. Stay aware of the 
<story>balance between your pivot foot and lower body, your center of 
<story>gravity… I see, I see.

data.text:
Um, is it okay if I go run a bit more? 
Trainer-san, I want to test out what you 
just taught me as soon as possible.
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: Alright, but only for a little bit

data.processed:
<story>Um, is it okay if I go run a bit more? 
<story>Trainer-san, I want to test out what you 
<story>just taught me as soon as possible.

data.text:
Thank you very much! 
Allllright! I'm gonna reduce my time～!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much! 
<story>Allllright! I'm gonna reduce my time～!

data.text:
The profile of Kitasan Black as she 
was running was beautiful and intense, 
it was captivating.
data.processed:
<story>The profile of Kitasan Black as she 
<story>was running was beautiful and intense, 
<story>it was captivating.

data.text:
Always proceeding forward, Kitasan Black was 
overflowing with ambition. Her presence 
helped raise the morale of those around her-

choices.text:
(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)
choices.processed:
<size=32>(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)</size>

choices.text:
(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)
choices.processed:
<size=32>(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>Always proceeding forward, Kitasan Black was 
<story>overflowing with ambition. Her presence 
<story>helped raise the morale of those around her-

data.text:
I rubbed my tired eyes, and lightly slapped my own cheeks. It 
was my duty to sincerely work hard for her sake, so I needed to 
keep myself motivated.
data.processed:
<story>I rubbed my tired eyes, and lightly slapped my own cheeks. It 
<story>was my duty to sincerely work hard for her sake, so I needed to 
<story>keep myself motivated.

data.text:
And so, you see, Dad?! 
Trainer-san is amazing!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>And so, you see, Dad?! 
<story>Trainer-san is amazing!

data.text:
The training is tough but, even I can 
feel that it's really making me stronger-
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>The training is tough but, even I can 
<story>feel that it's really making me stronger-

data.text:
Whenever I have doubts, he clears them up, 
and he's always adjusting the training menu 
based on what happens during the day!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Whenever I have doubts, he clears them up, 
<story>and he's always adjusting the training menu 
<story>based on what happens during the day!

data.text:
Yeah, that's right. I'm always really really 
worried and sometimes I can't even come up 
with a proper answer but…
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, that's right. I'm always really really 
<story>worried and sometimes I can't even come up 
<story>with a proper answer but…

data.text:
Hmmm, it's not working! The more I try to 
ignore it, the more I end up focusing too 
much on who's behind me.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, it's not working! The more I try to 
<story>ignore it, the more I end up focusing too 
<story>much on who's behind me.

data.text:
But even if I could, only focusing 
on what's ahead makes me uneasy…
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>But even if I could, only focusing 
<story>on what's ahead makes me uneasy…

data.text:
Ah, well… something like whether or not they're 
making their move. Or if they're coming up really 
quickly behind me, or something.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Ah, well… something like whether or not they're 
<story>making their move. Or if they're coming up really 
<story>quickly behind me, or something.

data.text:
In those cases, I should probably just face them 
head-to-head, right? But, if I'm too focused on 
them, I won't be able to run properly…
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: Kitasan, what's your running style again?

data.processed:
<story>In those cases, I should probably just face them 
<story>head-to-head, right? But, if I'm too focused on 
<story>them, I won't be able to run properly…

data.text:
My running style?…is "Escape". Running and 
running, making sure to stay in front.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>My running style?…is "Escape". Running and 
<story>running, making sure to stay in front.

data.text:
Staying strong until the end, no matter who 
comes up behind me, going fast enough to 
make sure nobody can pass me.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Staying strong until the end, no matter who 
<story>comes up behind me, going fast enough to 
<story>make sure nobody can pass me.

data.text:
Pulling away from those following, 
and reaching the goal first… 
that's the way I run!
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text:
Even with that, you focus 
on the ones behind you?
choices.processed:
<size=32>Even with that, you focus 
on the ones behind you?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Pulling away from those following, 
<story>and reaching the goal first… 
<story>that's the way I run!

data.text: …-Ah.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>…-Ah.

data.text:
Trainer-san, always seems to have 
the answer to what's bothering me 
but, that's not all either.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, always seems to have 
<story>the answer to what's bothering me 
<story>but, that's not all either.

data.text:
The times he says we should think about 
things together, even if I can't think of 
any answers, he'll give me advice.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>The times he says we should think about 
<story>things together, even if I can't think of 
<story>any answers, he'll give me advice.

data.text:
I want to be someone cool like that. Being 
able to analyze anything so effortlessly, 
someone like that-
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>I want to be someone cool like that. Being 
<story>able to analyze anything so effortlessly, 
<story>someone like that-

data.text: …eh?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>…eh?

data.text:
… 
Well, that's…
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>… 
<story>Well, that's…

data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
I see, that's right. 
…it should have been so obvious, though.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>I see, that's right. 
<story>…it should have been so obvious, though.

data.text:
At her father's words, Kitasan Black must have realized 
something. With the way she clenched her fists, it seems she 
had come to a decision.
data.processed:
<story>At her father's words, Kitasan Black must have realized 
<story>something. With the way she clenched her fists, it seems she 
<story>had come to a decision.
